name: Lisle 63600 Car Oil Filter Wrench for 2-1/2" to 3-1/8" Filters
short_description: Fits Filters from 2 1/2" to 3 1/8".
Removes all oil filters from 2 1/2" to 3 1/8" in diameter.
This extra large range enables the 63600 wrench to fit most all import car filters plus the common 3" domestic car filters.
Steel jaws grip filter without slipping. Works in tight spots from the front of the filter using 3/8" drive.
This is to be used for removing the filter, not installing.

name: 8PCS Oil Filter Wrench Set – Stainless Steel Swivel Wrenches (1-3/4”to 5-1/4”), 9” & 12” Adjustable Pliers, Universal 3-Jaw Remover with Adapter, Organized in Storage Case for Auto Repair
short_description: COMPLETE SET: CARVALAX Oil Filter Wrench Set includes everything you need for efficient oil changes that covers filter size from 1-3/4” to 5-1/4”: 4 stainless steel swivel wrenches, 9" and 12" adjustable plier wrenches, a universal 3-jaw oil filter removal tool, and a ratchet adapter from 1/2" to 3/8" drive—all neatly organized in a durable carrying case for easy storage and transport.

DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: CARVALAX Oil Filter swivel wrenches are crafted from high-quality stainless steel with anti-slip textured bands for superior grip and long-lasting durability. The pliers feature a corrosion-resistant black phosphating finish, ideal for frequent use in oily environments. Ergonomic PVC handles offer a comfortable, non-slip grip for added control and safety.

SWIVEL HEAD DESIGN: Four Swivel Head Oil Filter Wrenches have size ranges of 2-3/4”to 3-1/4” (70-83mm), 3-1/4”to 3-7/8” (83-98mm), 3-7/8”to 4-3/8” (98-111mm), and 4-5/8”to 5-1/4” (117-133mm) respectively. These wrenches rotate up to 180°, providing easy access in tight engine compartments. This set ensures compatibility with most vehicle oil filters, delivering unmatched flexibility and performance for car maintenance professionals and DIY users.

ADJUSTABLE PLIER WRENCHES: The 9” and 12” pliers are engineered for strength and precision, featuring a 5-position slip joint design that adjusts quickly to fit various filter sizes in two ranges: 1-3/4” to 3” (44-76mm), and 2-1/2” to 3-3/4” (64-95mm). Serrated jaws ensure a firm grip—even on oily or stubborn filters—while the extended handle provides extra leverage for effortless removal in confined spaces.

3-JAW REMOVER: CARVALAX Oil Filter Wrench Set includes a universal 3-jaw oil filter remover designed to fit a wide range of filter sizes (2-1/2” to 4” or 64-102mm) and shapes. Its self-adjusting jaws provide a secure grip on both round and irregular filters without causing damage. Compatible with both 1/2" and 3/8" ratchet drives, this tool makes oil changes faster and easier—especially in tight spaces where traditional wrenches can't reach.
